trans-unit.source: Represents errors that occur when a specified message class name is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 表示在指定消息类名无效时发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: This exception can occur if you specify an invalid message class name for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionMessageClassAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的无效消息类名称，则可能出现此异常<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionMessageClassAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: This exception can also occur if you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.TargetForm%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction> to an invalid message class name.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置，也会发生此异常<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.TargetForm%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction>到无效的消息类名称。

trans-unit.source: For more information about valid message class names, see [Associating a Form Region with an Outlook Message Class](/visualstudio/vsto/associating-a-form-region-with-an-outlook-message-class.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关有效 message 类名的详细信息，请参阅[将窗体区域与 Outlook 邮件类关联](/visualstudio/vsto/associating-a-form-region-with-an-outlook-message-class.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.InvalidMessageClassException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.InvalidMessageClassException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.InvalidMessageClassException" /> class by using the invalid message class name.
trans-unit.target: 使用无效的消息类名初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.InvalidMessageClassException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the invalid message class name.
A string that represents the invalid message class name.
trans-unit.target: 表示无效的 message 类名称的字符串。
